casebody.data:
159 A.3d 1249 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND, Petitioner v. Artemio RIVERA, Respondent. Misc. Docket AG No. 7,

Sept. Term, 2017

Court of Appeals of Maryland. May 18, 2017

ORDER

Upon consideration of the Petition for Disciplinary or Remedial Action filed by Petitioner pursuant to Maryland Rule 19-721(a)(2) and 19-738 and the Respondent’s response to the Court’s Order to Show Cause, it is this 18th day of May, 2017, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland;

ORDERED, that the Respondent, Artemio Rivera, be and hereby is temporarily suspended from the practice of law in the State of Maryland pursuant to Maryland Rule 19-738(d) until further order of this Court; and it is further

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall remove the name of Artemio Rivera from the register of attorneys in this Court and certify that fact to the Trustees of the Client Protection Fund of the Bar of Maryland and all Clerks of all judicial tribunals in this State in accordance with Maryland Rule 19-761(b).
